titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERSON WEIGHT (AT TWO YEAR NEONATAL OUTCOMES ASSESSMENT) - Description

body.p: PERSON WEIGHT (AT TWO YEAR NEONATAL OUTCOMES ASSESSMENT) records the Weight of the PATIENT (child) as recorded at a Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment , where the UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is ' Kilograms'.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment , where the Weight measurement was not taken on the Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment Date, the actual OBSERVATION DATE (WEIGHT) should be recorded.
